data.expected_result: Client uses "few" plural argument - "24 серверА недоступны ..." (Russian example)
data.short_description: Android uses wrong plural argument for servers in outage warning
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch language to one that requires "few" plural argument (In my example it's Russian) - Have servers in outage that matches "few" plural argument (2-4, 22-24) - Click on the icon of outage warning
